channel.title: HBG V5 - 96% castlewars, and MORE - Look and vote!
channel.description:
Yes, It is true, I am going to release HBG-Scape V5 soon, and it will be the best one yet!
It will include:
-Full magic, working vengeance, set timers, and FULL autocast! Will use all correct runes! -Fixing the blood rune glitch! -Full working range, with ALL range weapons farcasting! (OMG hax Rune C'Bow coming with the bolt effects too!) -10+ areas added for skilling and raising non-combat skills. -3+ Combat training areas for TRAINING ONLY. -9 Minigames - Torso minigame, Godwars, 96% Castlewars, Clan Wars 90%, Fight Caves 80%, Fight Pits, Mage Training Arena (in al kharid), Mage fight arena (the one in wild), and Ranging minigame! -3 PVP Areas! Single - Multi/norules - Fun pk -All new home area! -6 Quests - Desert Treasure - Lunar Diplomacy - Lost City - Monkey Madness - Roving Elves - Underground Pass -90% Def bonuses - Mage will splash, range will hit 0, melee will hit 0, ALOT like runescape! Defence level COUNTS! Mage will splash on D'hide half the time, unless bonus is high, mage will almost always hit melee, depending on the attacked players magic and def levels!!! same with range and melee! -100% SPECIALS! Godswords, Sara Sword, Anchor, Dragon Weapons, MSB, D BOW, ETC!!! -Client will be made to go along with it! -All teleporting done by portals! -Teleblock has now been fixed and added to ALL teleports, so if you are teleblocked, there IS not escaping by finding a tele that isnt blocked by it!
Please tell me what you guys think...
status will be added into my siggy once I finish this post...
PLEASE VOTE!!!
Also please put "&&" at the front of your post If you read EVERYTHING!

item.title: HBG V5 - 96% castlewars, and MORE - Look and vote!
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

Yes, It is true, I am going to release HBG-Scape V5 soon, and it will be the best one yet!

It will include:

-Full magic, working vengeance, set timers, and FULL autocast! Will use all correct runes!
-Fixing the blood rune glitch!
-Full working range, with ALL range weapons farcasting! (OMG hax Rune C’Bow coming with the bolt effects too!)
-10+ areas added for skilling and raising non-combat skills.
-3+ Combat training areas for TRAINING ONLY.
-9 Minigames - Torso minigame, Godwars, 96% Castlewars, Clan Wars 90%, Fight Caves 80%, Fight Pits, Mage Training Arena (in al kharid), Mage fight arena (the one in wild), and Ranging minigame!
-3 PVP Areas! Single - Multi/norules - Fun pk
-All new home area!
-6 Quests - Desert Treasure - Lunar Diplomacy - Lost City - Monkey Madness - Roving Elves - Underground Pass
-90% Def bonuses - Mage will splash, range will hit 0, melee will hit 0, ALOT like runescape! Defence level COUNTS! Mage will splash on D’hide half the time, unless bonus is high, mage will almost always hit melee, depending on the attacked players magic and def levels!!! same with range and melee!
-100% SPECIALS! Godswords, Sara Sword, Anchor, Dragon Weapons, MSB, D BOW, ETC!!!
-Client will be made to go along with it!
-All teleporting done by portals!
-Teleblock has now been fixed and added to ALL teleports, so if you are teleblocked, there IS not escaping by finding a tele that isnt blocked by it!

Please tell me what you guys think…

status will be added into my siggy once I finish this post…

PLEASE VOTE!!!

Also please put “&&” at the front of your post If you read EVERYTHING!
